THIS RARE OPPORTUNITY TO OWN AND LOVINGLY RESTORE A LHD 1967 SO 42 WESTFALIA CAMPER HAVING THE BENEFIT OF A RARE WALK THROUGH VERSION WITH A POP TOP ROOF.

RUNS DRIVES AND STOPS BUT WOULD BENEFIT FROM AN ENGINE SERVICE AND USUAL CHECK ROUND FOR MOT.

NEEDS USUAL SPLITTY WELDING REPAIRS SILLS, CAB FLOOR, BATTERY TRAY, FRONT VALANCE. ETC

THE CHASSIS IS SUPER SOLID ROOF GUTTERS AND AROUND FRONT WINDSCREENS ARE VERY GOOD.

WILL REQUIRE MOT AND REGISTERING ALL VAT AND DUTIES PAID!!!

OVERALL A VERY GOOD AND EASY RESTORATION PROJECT FOR OVER THE WINTER

OFFERS OVER £8000

ALSO FOR SALE WITH THE BUS IF REQUIRED TO COMPLETE THE OUTFIT IS THE SUPER ULTRA RARE BIG TOP TENT AWNING WITH POLES AND GUTTER TRACK VERY GOOD CONDITION FOR AN ADDITIONAL EXTRA £1000

YOU ARE WELCOME TO COME AND VEIW ANYTIME PLEASE RING MICK ON (07970849078) OR (01226 383338).
